job_details.Functieomschrijving:
After completion of the Academy, you will join your Region's Team as an AI Engineer. You will develop AI solutions and services that help our clients achieve their business outcomes using AI & Analytics.This role requires data science skills such as exploration data analysis, feature engineering, and ML models training and testing.You will work with a range of technologies, including advanced analytics, computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), large language models (LLM), unsupervised learning, and optimization, all primarily powered by Microsoft Azure. You will also be involved in applying MLOps technology for deployments.

   Day-to-day you will:
     * Develop AI projects and solutions.
     * Assist in the preparation of client presentations and proposals.
     * Conduct research and analysis on AI and ML technologies and trends to stay up to date with the latest advancements.
     * Contribute to the creation of custom training materials and code examples for a wide variety of AI solutions.
     * Work with senior team members to analyze current business practices and identify future opportunities for leveraging advanced analytics and AI solutions.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer Academy - Netherlands

After completion of the Academy, you will join your Region's Team as an AI Engineer. You will develop AI solutions and services that help our clients achieve their business outcomes using AI & Analytics.This role requires data science skills such as exploration data analysis, feature engineering, and ML models training and testing.You will work with a range of technologies, including advanced analytics, computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), large language models (LLM), unsupervised learning, and optimization, all primarily powered by Microsoft Azure. You will also be involved in applying MLOps technology for deployments.

   Day-to-day you will:
     * Develop AI projects and solutions.
     * Assist in the preparation of client presentations and proposals.
     * Conduct research and analysis on AI and ML technologies and trends to stay up to date with the latest advancements.
     * Contribute to the creation of custom training materials and code examples for a wide variety of AI solutions.
     * Work with senior team members to analyze current business practices and identify future opportunities for leveraging advanced analytics and AI solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes data science skills like exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and ML model training/testing. It mentions a range of AI technologies including computer vision, NLP, and LLMs, but the core focus appears to be on developing and deploying AI solutions that leverage these technologies for business outcomes, with a strong component of MLOps for deployment. While LLMs are mentioned, the emphasis on traditional ML model training and data science skills, along with the broader application of AI & Analytics for business outcomes, aligns more closely with the definition and evidence profile of an ML Engineer who productionizes models and works with data-driven algorithms.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'feature engineering' directly relates to preparing data for machine learning models, which is a core part of data engineering.
The phrases 'ML models training and testing' and 'unsupervised learning' directly refer to the process of creating, training, and evaluating machine learning models.
The phrase 'unsupervised learning' is a type of machine learning modeling.
The phrase 'optimization' can refer to optimizing model performance or parameters in machine learning.
The phrase 'Develop AI projects and solutions' implies building and implementing AI systems, which involves software development.
The phrase 'advanced analytics' often involves developing software components or systems to deliver these analytics.
The phrase 'computer vision' involves developing software that can interpret and process visual information.
The phrase 'natural language processing (NLP)' involves developing software that can understand and process human language.
The phrase 'large language models (LLM)' involves developing applications or systems that utilize LLMs.
The phrase 'applying MLOps technology for deployments' directly relates to the operational aspects of deploying and managing ML models.
The phrase 'help our clients achieve their business outcomes' indicates a need to understand business goals and align AI solutions with them.
job_tasks.phrase: help our clients achieve their business outcomes

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'analyze current business practices and identify future opportunities' shows a focus on understanding business context and identifying strategic applications of AI.
job_tasks.phrase: analyze current business practices and identify future opportunities

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'exploration data analysis' is a key step in understanding data before modeling, often considered part of the modeling lifecycle.

soft_skills.phrase: stay up to date with the latest advancements
Assist in the preparation of client presentations and proposals
Contribute to the creation of custom training materials and code examples
